page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: { Home Farm,}Gt Gaddesden,is farmed by the Halseys.It is highly mechanised and cattle are recorded and fed concentrates by{computer.}All production from an accounting point of view is computerized as are the wages of 8 permanent staff, 2 office staff, and 5 temporary staff. The{River Gade}runs through the farm which has its own{Trout Hatchery}for stocking the river with rainbow trout for the local Trout Fishing Syndicate. FARMING is extensive and there is five-year crop rotation with oil seed rape which was unused prior to the COMMON MARKET. The CROPS grown cover over 1435 acres & there are 441 grass acres this year. STUBBLE is burnt to clear the ground of fungus & since it is too expensive to stack it, straw is also burnt.
